description: Discover the Next 1000x Gem with Alph.ai Sponsors: @flapdotsh / @Origobase Alph.ai Memecoin Party Upper Alph U Above All Memecoin traders and on-chain degens this night is exclusively for you. No stage talks, no project pitches. Just real traders, influencers, and like-minded people in the same room at Hong Kong s premium sky-high location grabbing drinks, unfiltered insights and the next 1000x opportunity. It's here where you'll get the real alpha new narratives, subtle shifts and what's next in crypto!
